Verses: 1 yesu Olivamalaikkup Ponaar.
2 marunaal Kaalaiyile Avar Thirumbi Dhevaalayaththirku Vandhapodhu, Janangalellaarum Avaridaththil Vandhaargal. Avar Utkaarndhu Avargalukku Ubadhesampanninaar.
3 appozhudhu Vibasaaraththile Kandupidikkappatta Oru Sthreeyai Vedhapaaragarum Pariseyarum Avaridaththil Konduvandhu, Avalai Naduve Niruththi:
4 podhagare, Indha Sthree Vibasaaraththil Kaiyum Meyyumaaip Pidikkappattaal.
5 ippadippattavargalaik Kallerindhu Kollavendumendru Mose Nyaayappramaanaththil Namakkuk Kattalaiyittirukkiraare, Neer Enna Sollugireer Endraargal.
6 avarmel Kutranchumaththuvadharkaana Kaaranam Undaagumporuttu Avarai Sodhikkumpadi Ippadi Sonnaargal. Yesu Vo Gunindhu, Viralinaal Tharaiyile Ezhudhinaar.
7 avargal Oyaamal Avaraik Kettukkondirukkaiyil, Avar Nimirndhu Paarththu: Ungalil Paavamillaadhavan Ivalmel Mudhalaavadhu Kalleriyakkadavan Endru Solli,
8 avar Marupadiyum Gunindhu, Tharaiyile Ezhudhinaar.
9 avargal Adhaik Kettu, Thangal Manasaatchiyinaal Kadindhukollappattu, Periyormudhal Siriyorvaraikkum Ovvoruvaraaip Poivittaargal. Yesu Thaniththirundhaar, Andha Sthree Naduve Nindraal.
10 yesu Nimirndhu Andha Sthreeyaith Thavira Veroruvaraiyun Kaanaamal: Sthreeye, Unmel Kutranchaattinavargal Enge? Oruvanaagilum Unnai Aakkinaikkullaagath Theerkkavillaiyaa Endraar.
11 adharku Aval: Illai, Aandavare, Endraal. Yesu Avalai Nokki: Naanum Unnai Aakkinaikkullaagath Theerkkiradhillai; Nee Po, Inip Paavancheyyaadhe Endraar.
12 marupadiyum Yesu Janangalai Nokki: Naan Ulagaththirku Oliyaayirukkiren, Ennaip Pinpatrugiravan Irulile Nadavaamal Jeevaoliyai Adaindhiruppaan Endraar.
13 appozhudhu Pariseyar Avarai Nokki: Unnaik Kuriththu Neeye Saatchikodukkiraai; Unnudaiya Saatchi Unmaiyaanadhalla Endraargal.

14 yesu Avargalukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Ennaikkuriththu Naane Saatchikoduththaalum, En Saatchi Unmaiyaayirukkiradhu; Enenil Naan Engeyirundhu Vandhenendrum, Enge Pogirenendrum Arindhirukkiren; Neengalo Naan Engeyirundhu Varugirenendrum, Enge Pogirenendrum Ariyeergal.
15 neengal Maamsaththukketrapadi Nyaayantheerkkireergal, Naan Oruvanaiyum Nyaayantheerkkiradhillai;
16 naan Nyaayantheerththaal, En Theerppu Saththiyaththinpadiyirukkum; Enenil Naan Thaniththirukkavillai, Naanum Ennai Anuppina Pidhaavumaaga Irukkirom.
17 iranduperudaiya Saatchi Unmaiyendru Ungal Nyaayappramaanaththilum Ezhudhiyirukkiradhe.
18 naan Ennaikkuriththu Saatchikodukkiravanaayirukkiren, Ennai Anuppina Pidhaavum Ennaikkuriththu Saatchikodukkiraar Endraar.

19 appozhudhu Avargal: Ummudaiya Pidhaa Enge Endraargal. Yesu Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Ennaiyum Ariyeergal, En Pidhaavaiyum Ariyeergal; Neengal Ennai Arindheergalaanaal En Pidhaavaiyum Ariveergal Endraar.
20 dhevaalayaththile Yesu Ubadhesampannugirapodhu, Dharumappettiyirukkum Idaththil Indha Vasanangalai Sonnaar. Avarudaiya Velai Innum Varaadhapadiyinaal Oruvanum Avaraip Pidikkavillai.
21 yesu Marupadiyum Avargalai Nokki: Naan Pogiren, Neengal Ennaith Thedi Ungal Paavangalile Saaveergal; Naan Pogira Idaththukku Vara Ungalaal Koodaadhu Endraar.
22 appozhudhu Yoodhargal: Naanpogira Idaththukku Vara Ungalaal Koodaadhu Engiraane; Thannaiththaan Kolaiseydhukolluvaano Endru Pesikkondaargal.
23 avar Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Thaazhvilirundhundaanavargal, Naan Uyarvilirundhundaanavan; Neengal Indha Ulagaththilirundhundaanavargal, Naan Indha Ulagaththilirundhundaanavanalla.
24 aagaiyaal Neengal Ungal Paavangalil Saaveergal Endru Ungalukku Sonnen; Naane Avar Endru Neengal Visuvaasiyaavittaal Ungal Paavangalile Saaveergal Endraar.
25 adharku Avargal: Neer Yaar Endraargal. Yesu Avargalai Nokki: Naan Aadhimudhalaai Ungalukku Solliyirukkiravardhaan.
26 ungalaikkuriththup Pesavum Nyaayantheerkkavum Enakku Anega Kaariyangalundu. Ennai Anuppinavar Saththiyamullavar; Naan Avaridaththil Kettavaigalaiye Ulagaththukku Sollugiren Endraar.
27 pidhaavaikkuriththup Pesinaarendru Avargal Ariyaadhirundhaargal.

28 aadhalaal Yesu Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Manushakumaaranai Uyarththina Pinbu, Naane Avarendrum, Naan Ensuyamaai Ondrum Seyyaamal, En Pidhaa Enakkup Podhiththapadiye Ivaigalai Sonnen Endrum Ariveergal.
29 ennai Anuppinavar Ennudanekooda Irukkiraar, Pidhaavukkup Piriyamaanavaigalai Naan Eppozhudhum Seygirapadiyaal Avar Ennaith Thaniye Irukkavidavillai Endraar.
30 ivaigalai Avar Sollugaiyil, Anegar Avaridaththil Visuvaasam Vaiththaargal.
31 yesu Thammai Visuvaasiththa Yoodhargalai Nokki: Neengal En Ubadhesaththil Nilaiththirundhaal Meyyaagave En Seesharaayiruppeergal;
32 saththiyaththaiyum Ariveergal, Saththiyam Ungalai Vidudhalaiyaakkum Endraar.

33 avargal Avarukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Naangal Aabiragaamin Sandhadhiyaayirukkirom, Naangal Orukkaalum Oruvanukkum Adimaigalaayirukkavillai; Vidudhalaiyaaveergalendru Neer Eppadi Sollugireer Endraargal.
34 yesu Avargalukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Paavancheygiravan Evanum Paavaththukku Adimaiyaayirukkiraan Endru Meyyaagave Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.
35 adimaiyaanavan Endraikkum Veettile Nilaiththiraan; Kumaaran Endraikkum Nilaiththirukkiraar.
36 aagaiyaal Kumaaran Ungalai Vidudhalaiyaakkinaal Meyyaagave Vidudhalaiyaaveergal,
37 neengal Aabiragaamin Sandhadhiyaarendru Ariven; Aanaalum Ungalukkulle En Ubadhesam Idamperaadhapadiyaal, Ennaik Kolaiseyyath Thedugireergal.
38 naan En Pidhaavinidaththil Kandadhai Sollugiren, Neengalum Ungal Pidhaavinidaththil Kandadhai Seygireergal Endraar.
39 adharku Avargal: Aabiragaame Engal Pidhaa Endraargal. Yesu Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Aabiragaamin Pillaigalaayirundhaal Aabiragaamin Kiriyaigalai Seyveergale.
40 dhevanidaththil Kettirukkira Saththiyaththai Ungalukku Sonna Manushanaagiya Ennaik Kollath Thedugireergal, Aabiragaam Ippadi Seyyavillaiye.
41 neengal Ungal Pidhaavin Kiriyaigalai Seygireergal Endraar. Adharku Avargal: Naangal Vesiththanaththinaal Pirandhavargalalla; Ore Pidhaa Engalukku Undu. Avar Dhevan Endraargal.
42 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Dhevan Ungal Pidhaavaayirundhaal Ennidaththil Anbaayiruppeergal. Enenil Naan Dhevanidaththilirundhu Vandhirukkiren; Naan Suyamaai Varavillai, Avare Ennai Anuppinaar.
43 en Vasanaththai Neengal En Ariyaamalirukkireergal? En Ubadhesaththaik Ketka Manadhillaadhirukkiradhinaal Allavaa?

44 neengal Ungal Pidhaavaagiya Pisaasaanavanaal Undaanavargal; Ungal Pidhaavinudaiya Ichchaigalinpadi Seyya Manadhaayirukkireergal; Avan Aadhimudharkondu Manushakolaipaadhaganaayirukkiraan; Saththiyam Avanidaththilillaadhapadiyaal Avan Saththiyaththile Nilainirkavillai; Avan Poiyanum Poikkup Pidhaavumaayirukkirapadiyaal Avan Poipesumbodhu Than Sondhaththil Eduththup Pesugiraan.
45 naan Ungalukku Saththiyaththai Sollugirapadiyinaale Neengal Ennai Visuvaasikkiradhillai.
46 ennidaththil Paavam Undendru Ungalil Yaar Ennaik Kutrappaduththakkoodum? Naan Saththiyaththai Solliyirukka, Neengal En Ennai Visuvaasikkiradhillai.
47 dhevanaal Undaanavan Dhevanudaiya Vasanangalukku Sevikodukkiraan; Neengal Dhevanaal Undaayiraadhapadiyinaal Sevikodaamalirukkireergal Endraar.
48 appozhudhu Yoodhargal Avarukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Unnai Samaariyanendrum, Pisaasupidiththavanendrum Naangal Sollugiradhu Saridhaane Endraargal.
49 adharku Yesu : Naan Pisaasupidiththavanalla, Naan En Pidhaavai Ganampannugiren, Neengal Ennaik Ganaveenam Pannugireergal.
50 naan Enakku Magimaiyaith Thedugiradhillai; Adhaith Thedi Nyaayantheerkkiravar Oruvar Irukkiraar.
51 oruvan En Vaarththaiyaik Kaikkondaal, Avan Endrendraikkum Maranaththaik Kaanbadhillai Endru Meyyaagave Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren Endraar.

52 appozhudhu Yoodhargal Avarai Nokki: Nee Pisaasu Pidiththavanendru Ippozhudhu Arindhirukkirom; Aabiragaamum Theerkkadharisigalum Mariththaargal. Neeyo: Oruvan En Vaarththaiyaik Kaikkondaal Endrendraikkum Maranaththai Rusipaarppadhillai Engiraai.
53 engal Pidhaavaagiya Aabiragaamilum Nee Periyavano? Avar Mariththaar, Theerkkadharisigalum Mariththaargal; Unnai Nee Eppadippattavanaakkugiraai Endraargal.
54 yesu Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Ennai Naane Magimaippaduththinaal Andha Magimai Veenaayirukkum, En Pidhaa Ennai Magimaippaduththugiravar, Avarai Ungal Dhevanendru Neengal Sollugireergal.

55 aayinum Neengal Avarai Ariyavillai, Naan Avarai Arindhirukkiren; Avarai Ariyen Endru Solvenaagil Ungalaippola Naanum Poiyanaayiruppen; Avarai Naan Arindhu, Avarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kaikkondirukkiren.
56 ungal Pidhaavaagiya Aabiragaam Ennudaiya Naalaik Kaana Aasaiyaayirundhaan; Kandu Kalikoorndhaan Endraar.
57 appozhudhu Yoodhargal Avarai Nokki: Unakku Innum Aimbadhu Vayadhaagavillaiye, Nee Aabiragaamaik Kandaayo Endraargal.
58 adharku Yesu : Aabiragaam Undaagiradharku Munname Naan Irukkiren Endru Meyyaagave Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren Endraar.
59 appozhudhu Avarmel Eriyumpadi Kallugalai Eduththukkondaargal. Yesu Maraindhu, Avargal Naduve Kadandhu, Dhevaalayaththai Vittupponaar.
